name: Sword of the Earth
description:
Sword of the Earth is a 3D role-playing game that uses the sword of the earth to defeat the demons.
The brave gathered together under the arrangement of fate to jointly eliminate the last demons and maintain the peace and stability of the world.

To complete the entire game, you must constantly knock down various monsters that appear around the earth in order to earn experience and money; experience can be upgraded, and coins can be used to buy more powerful weapons. Players need to pay attention to the dialogue of important people in the game in order to promote the development of the entire story.

The game has the perfect system of RPG necessary items, skills, equipment, articles, archives, etc., using classic turn-based battles, world maps.
